title: SPY + STOKED Mentoring at the Volcom Unsound Pro
description:
SPY was Happy to partner with STOKED Mentoring during the 2014 Volcom Unsound Pro to spread cheeks and help transform the lives of at-risk youth through surfing. 

Hosting an expression session that paired 12 kids from STOKED with 12 surfers, including SPY team riders Alex Gray, Cody Thompson and Pat Schmidt, competitors enjoyed lighthearted competition and left the beach with a smile.
